item.title: Relationships between container-related technologies, and Containerd
item.description: “Dockershim deprecated with the release of Kubernetes 1.24” Â¶ The above sentence is the headline of an article published in The Register. What do you think of the sentence? I was just curious about the technology implemented by containers, but didn’t think much of it because I didn’t make a living using the related technology. However, I recently found out that it was a very big topic in the related industry.
